templateResume.summary: Creative Frontend Engineer with 5+ years of experience building responsive, accessible, and high-performing web applications. Passionate about modern UI/UX, rapid prototyping, and performance optimization.

highlights: Built high-performance web experiences with React and Next.js.
Collaborated with designers and PMs to refine UX and visual consistency.
Led the implementation of component libraries for reusable UI.
Delivered modular dashboards for analytics and product telemetry.
Improved load times by 35% through optimized code splitting.
